data.name: My Name Is Uter
data.detailed_description:
The humble adventure of a plush duck named Uter in this cruel world. Why cruel? Uter is the faithful toy of the famous streamer and has long been hunted by evil agents. And Uter's passion for freedom only pushed the hunters to their cherished prey. But why are they chasing Uther, is it just to use him to control the streamer's actions? You will learn about this in our game My Name Is Uter.



If you want to brighten up one of your evenings - then welcome.
  • Effortless gameplay
  • Collecting absolutely unnecessary items for achievements
  • Calm environment
  • Cute characters (as well as NPCs with their monologues)
  • Without a long and boring story
  • Many secrets :0
data.about_the_game:
The humble adventure of a plush duck named Uter in this cruel world. Why cruel? Uter is the faithful toy of the famous streamer and has long been hunted by evil agents. And Uter's passion for freedom only pushed the hunters to their cherished prey. But why are they chasing Uther, is it just to use him to control the streamer's actions? If you want to brighten up one of your evenings - then welcome.

data.short_description: Are you want to play with a toy? Oh, sorry... I mean Do you want to play as a toy? Well, then this game is made for you. The great adventure is waiting for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 4 gen | AMD Ryzen 3 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 | AMD Radeon RX550 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel core I5 9 gen | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 | AMD Radeon 570 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 460
  • Additional Notes: Minimum: 3GB VRAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5000 Series
  • Additional Notes: Recommended: 4GB VRAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Processor with 3GB VRAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Processor with 4GB VRAM
